body_html: cuda is made a method since it is a relatively expensive operation, which involves copying data from CPU to GPU. While grad and data are cheap operations (O(1)), which only retrieve references to the corresponding Tensor. I think making cuda a method is reasonable.
body_text: cuda is made a method since it is a relatively expensive operation, which involves copying data from CPU to GPU. While grad and  data are cheap operations (O(1)), which only retrieve references to the corresponding Tensor. I think making cuda a method is reasonable.
body: `cuda` is made a method since it is a relatively expensive operation, which involves copying data from CPU to GPU. While `grad` and  `data` are cheap operations (`O(1)`), which only retrieve references to the corresponding Tensor. I think making `cuda` a method is reasonable.
